text: Hamai taomhoi pok qaʙl az nozil sudani Tavrot ʙaroi ʙani Isroil halol ʙud, ʙa cuz cizhoe andake, ki Ja'quʙ (alajhissalom ʙa saʙaʙi ʙemorias) ʙaroi xud harom karda ʙud. Vale Alloh ʙa saʙaʙi sitamkorii ʙani Isroil ʙa'ze ta'omhoero, ki ʙaroi onon halol ʙud, harom gardonid; Bigu: «agar rostgu hasted, pas, Tavrotro ʙijovaredu ʙixoned
